roadrunner.engine.space

类 Collapser

  • java.lang.Object
    • roadrunner.engine.ExpressionIterator
      • roadrunner.engine.Backtracker
        • roadrunner.engine.space.Collapser

  • public class Collapser
extends Backtracker
    Collapses as much as possible on the specified region Whenever another square can be collapsed only by introducing a first subtree, it sets a backtracking point and the current result is returned

    • 嵌套类概要
